#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int gi[1000],bo[1000],i,a,j,b,g,min;
    //cin>>n;
        min=10000000;
        cin>>g;
        for(i=0;i<g;i++)
        cin>>gi[i];
        cin>>b;
        for(i=0;i<b;i++)
        cin>>bo[i];
        sort(bo,bo+b);
        sort(gi,gi+g);
        /*for(i=0;i<g;i++)
        cout<<gi[i]<<" ";
        cout<<endl;
        for(i=0;i<b;i++)
        cout<<bo[i]<<" ";
        cout<<endl;*/
        i=0,j=0;
        while(i<g&&j<b)
        {
            a=abs(bo[j]-gi[i]);
            //cout<<a<<endl;
            if(gi[i]<bo[j])
                i++;
            else
                j++;
            if(a<min)
            min=a;
        }
    cout<<min<<endl;
    return(0);

}
